thread.title: Come ON! What has Chuck Schumer ‘troubled’ about ICE raids is a real head-scratcher
thread.title_full: Come ON! What has Chuck Schumer ‘troubled’ about ICE raids is a real head-scratcher

author: Doug P.
title: Come ON! What has Chuck Schumer ‘troubled’ about ICE raids is a real head-scratcher
text:
Come ON! What has Chuck Schumer ‘troubled’ about ICE raids is a real head-scratcher Posted at 4:46 pm on February 13, 2017 by Doug P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
In spite of the fact that recent ICE raids have helped get dozens and dozens of people who are in the country illegally and had prior felony convictions off the street, Senator Chuck Schumer is demanding to know more: Troubled by lack of transparency & due process violations in ICE enforcement actions. Calling on ICE to release location & arrests info. 
— Chuck Schumer (@SenSchumer) February 13, 2017 Schumer says "targeting law-abiding innocent immigrant families..is a waste of limited resources and undermines law enforcement" 
— Chad Pergram (@ChadPergram) February 13, 2017 Trending
